title: Ep. 443: How to Live Your Best Half with Naomi Watts
itunes:title: Ep. 443: How to Live Your Best Half with Naomi Watts
description:
Actress Naomi Watts wants to have a conversation about menopause—and we are here for it! We chat about cultural attitudes toward aging, whether the “last f**kable day” is still a thing, why menopause was a taboo topic for our moms and their moms, and why that needs to change. Plus, she shares the secrets she’s learned to living her best half (aka, the second half of her life); how she’s dealt with all the changes that happen “scalp to vag” before, during, and after menopause; her new brand, Stripes; and some of her favorite beauty products.

  • Products & people mentioned on Ep. 443: shopmy.us/collections/77586
  • Episode recap, links, and sponsor promo codes: fatmascara.com/blog
